cause.description:
Gangstas are broke mother fuckas. So is Nam. Gangstas are broke because they spent all their money on AK 47s and glock 45s. Nam is broke because Stanford has increased the its tuition. They need $ to buy stuff to survive.
1. Help Nam
2. Help a Thug
3. Help a Gangsta
cause.mission: Help the Gangstas and Nam Survive
cause.name: United Gangsta Help Nam Foundation
